DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan 's valacyclovir hydrochloride 1000 mg tablet GlaxoSmithKline 's Valtrex® 1000 mg tablet follow single , oral 1000 mg ( 1 x 1000 mg ) dose administration fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Food Study Valacyclovir Hydrochloride Tablets 1000 mg Valtrex® Tablets 1000 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy , adult subject , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
